projects.title: Air Drums
projects.bodyText:
- Drumless Drumsticks developed using signal processing techniques.
 -  Integrated hardware in a custom PCB.
 - Developed an app to make the drumsticks fully customizable.

projects.title: EEG Based Servo-Motor Control
projects.bodyText:
- Controlled a servo motor by measuring brain activity using **BioAmp EXG Pill**.
 -  Created a custom dataset by interfacing the subject's scalp and recorded EEG signals using EEG headset.
 - Implemented a CNN model to process spectrogram data and perform a binary classification task.

projects.title: Soccer Simulation 2D
projects.bodyText:
-  Implemented mechanism to kick and defend ball through coordinated movements in a software simulation.
 -  Implemented two rcss clients to connect to rcsserver.
 - Worked on building our own log file and real-time parsing.

projects.title: IROS 2023 Wrestling Competition
projects.bodyText:
- Ranked 2nd Worldwide in Stage 1 and qualified for 1/8 finals. 
 - Worked on developing an ellipsoid gait-generator.
 - Created diverse motion files to enhance the motion capabilities of the bot.
